events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn’t fit at all. I’d like to return it and get a refund.
The customer's issue is classified under refund requests because they want to return a product for money back.
Assigning the case to Agent Sarah who specializes in return and refund handling for apparel.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. I’m here to help you with your jacket return and refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm the condition of the jacket, whether it has been used or damaged?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and hasn't been worn or damaged in any way.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly, and we’ll issue a full refund once received.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions on how to return the jacket.
I have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Please let us know once you ship the jacket so we can track the refund process.
Just following up to check if you were able to send back the jacket and if you have any questions about your refund.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday through the prepaid label, and I’m looking forward to receiving my refund soon.
We received your returned jacket today and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for contacting us. Your case is now closed. Please reach out if you have any further questions or need assistance.
